website_summaries.verdict: An affordable penne pasta that has several positive health benefits; however, consumers who are used to preparing traditional pasta may find it difficult to cook it to a preferred texture.
pros: A good choice for health-conscious consumers, as it's made with whole grains, which also means it contains a fair amount of fiber per serving
Popular penne shape for holding sauce
cons: The cooking process is challenging, because it tends to be too firm or gets soggy – and falls apart – if your timing isn't just right

customer_reviews.title: I’m never going back!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve completely given up plain pasta since I found this! Anything you would do with regular pasta, you can do with the whole grain. That said, comparing this to regular pasta is like comparing real, whole-grain wheat bread with wonder bread! It’s going to taste a little different. If you put tomato sauce on it, you’ll never notice a difference. If you usually eat your pasta with just olive oil, there will be a little difference - but not in a bad way. Even if you don’t like sauce, if you add Parmesan and herbs, it will be very hard to tell the difference. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite pasta
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pasta because they were out of my usual product. I'm very disappointed in this product. I don't care for the flavor or the way it cooks. I read reviews and the reviews on this product were good so I took a chance and ordered it. It is nothing like what I expected. The reviews raved about how good and healthy this pasta is. Well they can have it but I won't be one of them. I don't care one bit how healthy this stuff is. It taste awful. I will never purchase this pasta again. I don't recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Old man

customer_reviews.title: Great, tasty whole grain pasta, needs a bit of tweaking with cooking times for certain applications.
customer_reviews.text: I love the whole grain pasta, the twisty elbows and the little ridges to which sauce clings easily. The pasta is very fresh, great flavor and takes well to any application where one would use this type/shape of pasta. I am not a fan of "chewy" pasta in salads so I cooked this longer than the recommended time and found that 12 to 15 minutes produces a tender result that works well in salads. Same with mac and cheese. The first batch, cooked for the recommended 7 minutes, was much too chewy and the pasta on the top of the casserole was hard and some was inedible. Definitely needs longer cooking but once it achieves that, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: andiesenji

customer_reviews.title: Good whole wheat pasta, great convenience
customer_reviews.text: It's a mediocre pasta made only of whole wheat so you can indulge carb cravings relatively guilt-free. It definitely tastes worse than nicer pasta made w/ egg and semolina or even just middling pasta made w/ non whole wheat, but with decent sauce the difference is not that noticeable. I do quite a bit of running/aim for ~3,500kcal/day of food without meat, so I consume this in quantities bordering on obscene, so the trade-offs inherent to whole wheat pasta wrt taste are quite worth it for me. It's also more convenient and less expensive (which seems ridiculous given the shipping overhead but it's true) to order this from Amazon than picking it or an equivalent up at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: R. George

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture.
customer_reviews.text: Nice texture especially for Angel hair. Smooth taste, doesn't have a bite. And to the best of my knowledge, my local supermarket that has some Barilla whole wheat pasta that can be priced a bit less than angel hair but doesn't stock the Angel hair. Note: I cook this in a microwave in a covered Pyrex bowl. Get some water boiling. Put in pasta and bring it to a boil again. Then about finish off on low power. Drain and eat in the same bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Healthier but just as tasty
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, and the difference between white pasta and this whole grain pasta has gone surprisingly unnoticed or at least accepted by two children with major sensory issues. I feel better about feeding this to my children than regular pasta, and the package size is ideal to last a while in an average family.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy single boxes in the grocery store again now that i know i can get the exact same product on amazon in bulk! I especially like how the exp date is more than a year out but an sure I'll go through it all by then.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Whole-grain Spaghetti
customer_reviews.text: I started buying whole grain spaghetti recently since it's better for you than the white spaghetti. All natural nutrition plus the bran. I tried Barilla whole-grain spaghetti and found it's a good brand. Price is reasonable also. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Hart

customer_reviews.title: yuck!
customer_reviews.text: We hated the taste and texture of this pasta. We were shipped a box of 8 boxes. We used one and I doubt we can return the other 7.
customer_reviews.author: Garmo

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging and a great product
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to go to whole grain pastas. Barilla has always been a favorite brand of hours and it's been impossible to find angel hair pasta in whole grain. This box of angel hair pasta came in good condition with none broken. Good packaging and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Edith A.

customer_reviews.title: What can you really say?
customer_reviews.text: I agree with most of the other reviews..this is some good pasta...I just boiled up the entire box...added some cheese from a box of Annie's Mac N Cheese and added some pepper jack to boot....this is some tasty stuff....priced right
customer_reviews.author: David Glazer

customer_reviews.title: This Whole Grain Pasta is all we will eat!
customer_reviews.text: This Whole Grain Pasta is all we will eat! We buy it for the texture and flavor it has. Of course, every one has their own sense of flavor and desired texture. This happens to fit ours!
customer_reviews.author: Jahmen Myst aka Jahman Myst

customer_reviews.title: Nice whole wheat pasta
customer_reviews.text: I know it's healthy, but I like regular Barilla pasta, better. I made macaroni salad, and I like it better, made with regular pasta. If you like whole wheat pasta, you will like this.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 101

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Barilla pasta and the Whole Wheat varieties are excellent. The really keep me full and promote weight loss. The price is better than retail and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: pd01

customer_reviews.title: Good pasta and normally at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: When this is at $8.00 for 8 boxes this is a great price ( cheaper than my local grocery stores). What can I say about Barilla pasta - they make good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & taste good
customer_reviews.text: Love this Barilla pasta. Cooks quickly & pasta sauce tastes great with this pasta. My 7 year old granddaughter loves this pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Love my carbs
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, ok price. I love pasta and whole grains at that. Only thing is I wish that the expiration date was longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: A very good product. For me it is a quick, satisfying meal just topped with extra virgin olive oil and Parmesan cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Licorish

customer_reviews.title: Whole Grain pasta elbows contain less calories than regular elbows.
customer_reviews.text: I use a Joy Bauer recipe that is low cal mac and cheese and the recipe uses whole grain pasta elbows. Follow the recipe with this product and you will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Casale

customer_reviews.title: Tastes surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: This whole grain pasta tastes kind of like buckwheat noodles. I am pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: QQZJ

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: These are very favorful and healthy. High quality at a good price. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Velika

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For some reason we can't find whole grain elbow pasta in our area. I was thrilled to see it on Amazon. It was fresh and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: sde

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and great for the budget
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to the local stores! Love the taste and that I can feel better about feeding it to my pasta-loving child
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great thin wheat pasta
customer_reviews.text: This is the only whole wheat thin pasta I have found. It is delicious and just the right size to fit in any pasta dish. It cooks perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: This is such a good deal per box
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good deal per box. Has a good smooth pasta texture, and does not taste like whole grain. The boxes shipped fine, and nothing was torn or dented. Definitely a worthy subscribe and save item for everybody's pantry
customer_reviews.author: CinnamonDevil

customer_reviews.title: Richer taste.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good thin pasta, with a richer taste from the whole grain.
customer_reviews.author: NovelaFan A Graceful Season

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good whole grain macaroni
customer_reviews.text: My local grocer stopped carrying whole grain elbow macaroni so I was pleased to find it online and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't find in stores anymore
customer_reviews.text: Wife enjoys the Whole Wheat elbows. Our local grocery stores no longer carry them. So bought from Amazon. Just fine and she is back to enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves this pasta
customer_reviews.text: There's only one ingredient in this pasta (whole wheat) and it tastes better than any other pasta.
customer_reviews.author: San Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Whole wheat elbow macaroni
customer_reviews.text: Healthier version of pasta, I made goulash for the first time with this whole wheat pasta. I need to make more sauce next time other than that it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: I only buy whole wheat best you must go see the little longer and less you like Alvin day
customer_reviews.text: I only buy whole wheat pasta and this is the best you must go see the little longer and less you like Alvin day
customer_reviews.author: Roy martinez

customer_reviews.title: I love Angel Hair pasta, and this whole grain version is no exception.
customer_reviews.text: I like the whole grain for the healthy aspect. I used this pasta just like I use "white" angel hair. I used it with pasta sauce and meat balls.
customer_reviews.author: Fantastic GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Better pasta option.
customer_reviews.text: I need whole grain for health purposes and these are the best for the money. The store I shopped at didn’t carry them anymore, but, thankfully, Amazon does.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Arnhold

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I make my yorkie’s food, and these whole grain macaroni are a part of that. It cooks up al dente and is a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not going back to white flour pasta!!
customer_reviews.text: There is hardly any difference in taste as compared to the result pasta.. The plus side is that this feels healthier and doesn't leave you with that have feeling
customer_reviews.author: Nilesh

customer_reviews.title: Great source of fiber.
customer_reviews.text: Being a type 2 diabetic and a macaroni lover, I was excited to find these. I was having a hard time finding whole grain macaroni at my local stores. It is high in fiber which is great for diabetics like me. And they taste great. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Smiley 82

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs broth/sauce like a sponge
customer_reviews.text: The taste is okay. What I don’t like is that it keeps absorbing water for hours after cooking. When you serve it, it sucks up all the tomato sauce in about 10 mins. If you use it in a soup, the next day there will be no broth, and it will be 4x the size.
customer_reviews.author: Nickname1

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find healthy pasta, so I ordered a case! Great tasting
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to find in stores here.  Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this pasta. So... I like this pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Great pasta.... just think, 2 ounces of high fiber pasta per serving! The rest is just water! Well, that and some olive oil,olives, capers and some parmesan...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Tigue

customer_reviews.title: Great Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Great pasta and just a bit healthier since it's whole grain.
customer_reviews.author: KBeasley

customer_reviews.title: Yummy pasta.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived early, was fresh, delicious and a healthy whole grain pasta. Will order again. Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Judy45

customer_reviews.title: Great past for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: When I forget to get pasta from the store and don't want to go back this is what I order.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha O

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of Barilla Whole Grain is great. Barilla makes a quality product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanz65

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dogs, Just food for dogs recipe. My dog loves the elbows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Because of a medical condition I have substituted whole grain ...
customer_reviews.text: Because of a medical condition I have substituted whole grain pasta for all other types of pasta. I find no difference in taste and consistency of noodle after it is boiled. Serves my need well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A healthful alternative
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to regular macaroni for folks on or off heart-healthy diets.
customer_reviews.author: Steam-Writer

customer_reviews.title: Great Source of Fiber
customer_reviews.text: Barilla really makes a great whole grain angel hair. Goes best with my homemade sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Grow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item many times. We love it at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this pasta. We are family of 5 and actually with one box feeds us good meal. HAPPY with this. Does have a hearty taste but we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Trying to stay healthy
customer_reviews.text: I hope the whole grain health kick is right because we use it regularly. A little more expensive but worth it if it helps you be more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Whole wheat Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Good healthy pasta at a great price. So many ways to make sauces to go with it. Great item to have on hand at all times to make a quick delicious meal.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little grainy tasting but good when combined with regular pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Best Spaghetti Ever
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, best spaghetti ever. This is my second order. Thanks for the fast delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Expiring Sooner
customer_reviews.text: The expiry date is so close; less than a year. I believe such information should be disclosed upfront.

customer_reviews.title: Pasta Swap.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered whole grain elbow pasta. I received gluten free penne pasta.

customer_reviews.title: For pasta eaters
customer_reviews.text: Might as well buy this instead of getting a few at a time, great value

customer_reviews.title: but the price is good and taste is fine
customer_reviews.text: 100% whole wheat...may not be organic, but the price is good and taste is fine!

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Saves consumers 20 calories a serving. Wish the one box option was available. I bought a years supply.

customer_reviews.title: Barilla Whole Grain Pasta, Penne, 16 Ounce...
customer_reviews.text: Barilla Whole Grain Pasta, Penne, 16 Ounce... came on time and it is good.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product
customer_reviews.text: Penne is my preferred pasta and the whole grain option much healthier. Great value here via subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Rashman

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of spaghetti. It is easier to eat and takes the sauce well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: They looked like beetles. I'd purchased a case
customer_reviews.text: Found little insects in the bottom of one box. They looked like beetles. I'd purchased a case. I'd eaten a number of boxes from the case. Opened up another box of pasta and found the same. So I threw the rest of the unopened boxes away. And before you say the insects may have gotten in AFTER having been put in my cabinet...I had the case itself in my cabinet. I think it had a dozen boxes of pasta in it. So I was taking the boxes out of the case as I was using them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Whole grain
customer_reviews.text: It's whole grain and angel hair only need to boil 4-5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: alex chang

customer_reviews.title: Soggy
customer_reviews.text: This spaghetti is too thin and soggy and doesn't cook al dente. Blah!
customer_reviews.author: Anvil Panow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, but I won't buy anything else as long as they are linked to the NRA.
customer_reviews.author: K. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Excellent elbow macaroni with great texture and taste
customer_reviews.text: Don't follow the time of boiling indicated on the box. Take that as a general time but test your pasta as to doneness beginning at about 5 minutes. I cooked 2 - 4 pounds at a time it required about 7 minutes to be a dente and less than fully cooked for baking. This pasta made excellent macaroni and cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun GourmetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good whole wheat spaghetti product
customer_reviews.text: Nice tasting whole wheat spaghetti. Also nice to have a 1 pound and not just 12 oz. package a lot of whole wheat pasta products come in.
customer_reviews.author: macman

customer_reviews.title: Thin spaghetti
customer_reviews.text: I like this whole wheat thin spaghetti. It's not made with eggs and tastes great. Healthy and tasty is a great combination.
customer_reviews.author: sherry922

customer_reviews.title: Good flavot
customer_reviews.text: Great whole grain pasta- the children in my preschool love it - and you know they are the worst critics!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sonja

product_meta.title: Barilla Whole Grain Pasta, Penne, 16 Ounce (Pack of 8)
product_meta.description: Style:Penne 8 PackFrom its humble beginnings in 1877 as a small shop and bakery in Parma, Italy, Barilla has grown and strived to become the internationally trusted brand of pastas, sauces and Italian entrées that it is today. Our mission is to help people live better by bringing well-being and the joy of eating into their everyday lives. Barilla values its customers and employees, and believes that a sense of belonging, courage, and intellectual curiosity inspire our company’s behavior and characterize our people. Barilla has always linked its development to customers’ wellbeing and to the communities in which it operates. The Italian food tradition of superior quality and simple recipes is alive and well with Barilla’s line of Italian products. Let us transport you with our delicious and high quality pastas.
feature_bullets: Perfect as part of a main dish or a side
One of the most famous Italian pasta shapes is named for the quill of an old style ink pen
51% whole wheat and an excellent source of fiber
Good source of thiamin, folic acid, iron, riboflavin and niacin; Product of USA, Kosher certified

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
